dt: {bc}small or narrow in circumference or width in proportion to length or height
{bc}limited or inadequate in amount or scope {bc}{sx|meager||}

pt: {sc}thin{/sc} {sc}slender{/sc} {sc}slim{/sc} {sc}slight{/sc} {sc}tenuous{/sc} mean not thick, broad, abundant, or dense. {sc}thin{/sc} implies comparatively little extension between surfaces or in diameter, or it may imply lack of substance, richness, or abundance.
{sc}slender{/sc} implies leanness or spareness often with grace and good proportion.

pt.t: the {it}slender{/it} legs of a Sheraton chair

pt: {sc}slim{/sc} applies to slenderness that suggests fragility or scantiness.
{sc}slight{/sc} implies smallness as well as thinness.
{sc}tenuous{/sc} implies extreme thinness, sheerness, or lack of substance and firmness.

shortdef: spare in frame or flesh; especially : gracefully slight
small or narrow in circumference or width in proportion to length or height
limited or inadequate in amount or scope : meager
